text: <!channel> I was thinking you all could do 15 minutes for Standup in Steel and then transition to the UX kick off (same room). I won't be able to make it, but let me know if you have questions.

<@U0K8ZSHN0> Just checking out the Sommely website and I noticed that when you type in your email address to sign up for product updates, the "Sign Up" action button stays disabled (regardless of whether you've entered your email or not). Looks like you can still tap sign up, but the interaction now makes it look like something is broken. Would you be the right person to help me find out how to fix this?
